message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE 

This paper belongs to the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and specifically deals with machine transliteration. The most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with the processing of human language using computers. The paper also involves the use of statistical machine translation toolkit, which falls under the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The use of probabilities and relative frequency also suggests the involvement of machine learning techniques, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper deals with the transliteration of name entities, which can be considered as a sub-field of Named Entity Recognition (NER), falling under the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
